name: Lalo's Egg
description:
In this game you are Lalo, a worker in a highly industrial farm. One day you see an egg moving, making you feel bad for the chicken inside, so you grab the egg and attempt to escape the factory, but it's not that easy, since you left your job, all the factory is out of control.

Your objective in this game is to last longer in middle of the chaos of the factory, but be careful, if you go too fast the egg might fall of your head!
